snippet.description: Head out of Rome and off the beaten track to experience a different side of Italy in Tuscany and Umbria. Provided by Viator. 13 hours approx. You'll visit the lovely towns of Cortona and Montepulciano, and sample wine, cheeses, salami, olive oil and other local specialties.

snippet.title: Rome Food and Wine Guide - USA TODAY Travel
snippet.description: You can still dig into the world's best carbonara or cacio e pepe from ivy-clad osteria and knock back Peroni in a cobbled courtyard by night, but there is also a welcome breath of fresh air blowing through this storied culinary culture.
